[
    Expression {
        expr: Closure(
            Closure {
                start: (
                    3,
                    1,
                ),
                end: (
                    5,
                    1,
                ),
                templates: None,
                attributes: [],
                parameters: FunctionParameterList {
                    start: (
                        3,
                        10,
                    ),
                    end: (
                        3,
                        13,
                    ),
                    members: [],
                },
                return_ty: None,
                uses: [],
                by_ref: false,
                body: [
                    If {
                        condition: Variable(
                            Variable {
                                start: (
                                    4,
                                    9,
                                ),
                                name: "foo",
                                end: (
                                    4,
                                    13,
                                ),
                            },
                        ),
                        then: [
                            Expression {
                                expr: Variable(
                                    Variable {
                                        start: (
                                            4,
                                            15,
                                        ),
                                        name: "bar",
                                        end: (
                                            4,
                                            19,
                                        ),
                                    },
                                ),
                            },
                        ],
                        else_ifs: [],
                        else: None,
                    },
                ],
                static: false,
            },
        ),
    },
]
